syllabus_info.syllabus_name: Cambridge International AS & A Level Physics 9702

subtopic.sub_topic_name: Energy and momentum of a photon

learning_objectives.description: understand that electromagnetic radiation has a particulate nature
understand that a photon is a quantum of electromagnetic energy
use the electronvolt (eV) as a unit of energy
understand that a photon has momentum and that the momentum is given by p = E/c
